articles.title: Animal intelligence breakthrough: Ravens as smart as great apes in 'surprising' new study - Daily Express
articles.description: MANKIND has consistently underestimated the intelligence of ravens and other corvids, a scientist has said, after publishing the results of her startling new study which puts their cognitive ability on a par with great apes.

articles.author: Sebastian Kettley
articles.title: Yellowstone volcano: Drilling experiment triggered a 'violent eruption' of scorching steam - Daily Express
articles.description: YELLOWSTONE scientists drilling into the volatile supervolcano in the 1960s triggered an unexpected 'violent eruption' caused by scorching water mixing with steam underground.
